networkError.title: Network Issue
networkError.text: Oops! Something went wrong with the network. Error: {{message}}

btcRatesError.title: BTC Rate Retrieval Failed
btcRatesError.message: The displayed amounts in {{currency}} may not be accurate.

feeEstimatesError.title: Fee Estimate Retrieval Failed
feeEstimatesError.message: Displayed transaction target times and fee amounts may not be accurate.

vaultSetup.title: Vault Set Up
vaultSetup.notEnoughFunds: To ensure you can unvault at least {{minRecoverableRatioPercentage}}% of your Bitcoin in the future, ThunderDen establishes a minimum vaulting amount. This assumes express transaction confirmations and the possibility of ultra-high network fees when unvaulting.Suggested Addition: Add about {{missingFunds}} to reach the vaulting minimum. Note that the exact vaultable amount might slightly differ due to changes in network fee conditions.
vaultSetup.amountError: Pick a valid amount of Btc.
vaultSetup.reduceVaultAmount: Faster vault creation fees reduce maximum to {{amount}}

bip39.importWalletSubText: Begin the secure recovery of your wallet by entering the series of words you received during initial setup. These words are vital for regaining access and should always be kept private.
bip39.invalidWords: The word sequence you entered is not valid. Please double-check your words for any errors.
